section.name: What is this?
section.p: This is the maven site for the meercat component of Zebra and Antelope
It is a simple way of having 1 Hibernate Session within Tomcat per request.

section.name: Known Issues
section.p: See issuezilla for known issues with antelope

section.name: Future Plans
section.p: If we have time we will make this work using the Turbine Pipeline rather than ThreadLocal's as they are quite messy.
